DOC.brief_summary: This study test efficacy safety topical diclofenac sodium gel treatment knee osteoarthritis .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Diclofenac Sodium Gel Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Key Inclusion criterion Osteoarthritis knee Key Exclusion criteria Other rheumatic disease , rheumatoid arthritis Active gastrointestinal ulcer last year Known allergy analgesic drug
DOC.keyword: Knee osteoarthritis , Topical NSAID , Diclofenac sodium
